@dragonballz: No, 3D torrents are usually in the 3D section. YIFY just included the 3D part of the original title of the film in this torrent's title, but the actual file download is just Dredd (2012) and a non-3D BrRip. In the future, just check the sample photos linked in the info box. Actual 3D torrents will have two frames side-by-side in those sample shots (and be substantially larger file size).

to all the people saying "why isn't this in 3D?", the movie was marketed as "Dredd 3D" even when not shown in 3D. If you are looking for a 3D copy, TPB has a #D section now, hell, even a physibles too.

Video quality is very good for its size, but the audio is shit (snap crackle pop cereal comes to mind)...90kbps mp3??? you got another 50MB if you're looking to keep the video able to fit on a cd could have at least fit 160-192 kbps mp3 on there...
